text: Dr. Ripa is the best. He's really very good at his work and sure of what he does. I was always scared at dentists office, but after a root canal with him I can say this is the best dental visit I've had. So fast and always attentive to make sure I felt no pain. Many thanks to Dr. Anatoly Ripa and his friendly staff.

title: I RECOMMEND Dr. Ripa
